website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm X-Pro1 is a top-notch mirrorless camera that is sure to appeal to optical viewfinder fans that are put off by the high price of Leica rangefinders.
cons: Not a good choice for video

customer_reviews.title: First Rate Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for two weeks, and with two excellent lenses, it was a real bargain. Whatever troubles there may have been with manual or automatic focusing when the camera was first available have been sorted out with firmware updates. The quality of pictures, as to both resolution and realistic colour is excellent. There is a learning curve involved. This is no point-and-shoot. Heartily recommended
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wright

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Pro1
customer_reviews.text: Since receiving this camera I have been getting adjusted to using it to its full capability. It is very well made and certainly looks ands feels like a professional camera. It can be used as a shoot and click camera but the so can many cameras...this would be to waste its full capability. Since buying thsi camera I have also bought several Fujifilm lneses whist they are on special offer. These are also well made. So far I am very pleased with the p[hotographs that I have taken. I even saw a test result of the camera and the quality of the pictures was rated at 20 out opf 20...I have never seen another camera score this highly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: I'm probably the only one that doesn't like this camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm probably the only one that doesn't like this camera. I find it not so easy to handle. I don't like the IQ. I didn't find it good in low light. I have the Fuji X100 which I still love and the XT1 which I adore but for me this XPro1 just didn't cut the mustard for me. I guess it's just down to preference.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: ... bought the Fuji Xpro-1 as a replacement for my excellent Canon 60d and I can tell that the image ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the Fuji Xpro-1 as a replacement for my excellent Canon 60d and I can tell that the image quality is even better. The results with the 35mm lens are fantastic, especially in low-light situations and can rival some full-frame cameras. As for the "slow" auto-focus, for me there was no problem at all, maybe because of the software upgrade. The hybrid viewfinder is also very convenient. For me, the electronic viewfinder works better than the optical one, but that's a matter of taste. Overall, this nicely sized camera is perfect for street and portrait photography and at this price, it's a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Longinos

customer_reviews.title: brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: i dont care how old it is or how bad the focus used to be. now the focus speed is fine the hybrid viewfinder is brilliant and the colour and iq is excellent. the camera makes you want to take pictures and will not disappoint you. The controls are excellent too , going back to dials just makes sense. if you are even vaguely considering this camera just buy it .. best money ive ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Citizen Smith

customer_reviews.title: perfect camera if you have lots of old manual lenses ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect camera if you have lots of old manual lenses sitting around as there is a variety of adaptor rings to use. Excelent colour representation with various simulation modes (velvia etc) Looks good, feels solid and the digital-optical eye view is very helpful
customer_reviews.author: fanis anastasiadis

customer_reviews.title: great camera bidy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had fuji cameras five times the price, if you want a reliable camera producing great images then put a good lens on this and it’s all you need
customer_reviews.author: Graham C.

customer_reviews.title: Really good package, with 2 useful lenses to start off ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good package, with 2 useful lenses to start off your X series collection. The camera is beautifully made, produces excellent images, and is sufficiently compact to take anywhere. Recommended for enthusiasts rather than beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I love my Fuji x Pro 1
customer_reviews.text: A great camera, best buy I have made in a long time ,Super sharp pictures and easy to use and light weight, I have almost stopped using my canon .
customer_reviews.author: Katraz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Might be the older model but I am really pleased with this camera ......
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, intuitive to use and feels like a ...
customer_reviews.text: If you think of the Leica as a 'Rolls Royce' of cameras, the X-Pro 1 is a 'Bentley. Beautifully made, intuitive to use and feels like a 'real' camera. impressed with first results.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Lovely carry around camera
customer_reviews.text: Really nice camera, great image quality, better than I thought Auto focus and a doddle to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pmaccyd

customer_reviews.title: Superb build quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, reminds me of my old Leica M3, results are extremely good, really well made camera, lovely to use.
customer_reviews.author: melvinolotus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WEll engineered, I've not yet had an opportunity to pt it through its paces
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Alan Hooker

customer_reviews.title: un superbe appareil
customer_reviews.text: excellent qualité tant en jpeg comme raw. l'utilisation demande un peu de temps mais son approche est très plaisante.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: A lovely Camera to use - it is robust, clever and can be used for any occasion - I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Stepshed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted with it. Far lighter than my Nikon kit and producing excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Salopian76

customer_reviews.title: Very good product with a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly satisfied! The camera looks just like a new one with a careful packing. Really happy to get this lovely camera in such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Camera for an amazing price. Grab this deal while it's still available. As far as I know, only available in the UK.
customer_reviews.author: Itay Galim

customer_reviews.title: Job Done!
customer_reviews.text: At this price this has to be a massive bargain - although the camera has been around for a couple of years - it was built to last and built at a different price point - it's essentially free with the two lenses. Buy it and if you don't like it sell the items separately on ebay
customer_reviews.author: mbshrekito

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic camera and great value
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic camera and great value. Very light and compact but fully featured and then some! The sensor produces excellent colours and detail. Can be used with a variety of legacy lenses using adaptors. The Fuji lenses are of the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. A. Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. Super quality. Really is a joy to use it totally manual just like the old days but also have modem technology. However, the back buttons are too flush and I have to take my eye away from the veiw finder to look. I've solved this problem now by using Sugru to raise them a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Peter J. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Image quality
customer_reviews.text: a great camera with picture quality on level of a full frame camera like the canon 5d Mark II. With the newest SW3.40 the focus is fast enough for most scenes. I like the vintage style of this camera and the hybrid viewfinder.
customer_reviews.author: Picmasta

customer_reviews.title: I wish amazon would make sellers use photos of the actual item they are selling!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is more battered than i was led to believe! I wish amazon would make sellers use photos of the actual item they are selling, when I can afford it I will buy one in better condition because it takes great photos.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this using the Amazon app, there is no mention of the free case in the app so you may lose out. Otherwise a brilliant camera, still getting to grips with it, both lenses are fairly basic but will get you started.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... than expected and exactly as described - couldn't be happier with the
customer_reviews.text: arrived faster than expected and exactly as described - couldn't be happier with the service
customer_reviews.author: johnf

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, still no proper RAW support
customer_reviews.text: The images this camera can produce are stunningly sharp. It's a perfect camera to use as a 2nd pro body, which I do. If walking around all day, this is the only camera you need. The images stand up to any DSLR i've seen and in fact are often better. RAW support is taking forever though, Adobe do support the camera but the RAW results are horrible. Apple and Capture 1 support is apparently on the way, but who knows.
customer_reviews.author: MR MARK TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a Leica now we have this beauty?
customer_reviews.text: I carried out lots of research prior to purchasing this beauty. It really is amazing, "Quirky" but amazing. I use the xf 18-55 and xf 35mm lenses. Ive shot with friends Leica's many times and in my opinion this is up there with the best of them and for (in some cases) a tenth of the price. Its built like a tank and looks like a 70's film rangefinder. Simply Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is the best I've seen from a digital camera
customer_reviews.text: An incredible camera. Picture quality is the best I've seen from a digital camera. The lenses provided are excellent to and it feels like a proper camera. Amazing value with the 2 lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: but still a very good Camera, more sturdy and robust than the modern ...
customer_reviews.text: It's getting a bit old, but still a very good Camera, more sturdy and robust than the modern day x series cameras, this camera always pleases me and rarely lets me down, I just love it , for this price it's a bargain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still awesome for static photography, outdated for video or action photography.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of 2015 for a heavily discounted price, Superb camera for considered still photography, but very dated if you are into videography or action shooting. The whole experience oozes quality, and the two prime lenses are both excellent. It's a bit clunky for street photography and hard work to capture moving objects, but if you work at it you can get great results.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: One of the finest cameras available
customer_reviews.text: As a professional photographer I have used most equipment from Leica to Nikon. I currently use a Leica M9 costing £9000 - camera and body. This camera blows it away. It's not just the exceptional sharpness of the sensor, it's mostly the "look" of the photo. The colours are rich and accurate. White balance and exposure - perfect. The camera can be fiddly to use but the results are unique,. I have NEVER used anything that can produce perfect results like this straight out of JPEG, time after time, without having to change a thing in processing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. M. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: landscape Photography
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not for beginners, Remember if you set a small aperture for greater depth of field,you may need a tripod,because the camera may set a very slow speed especially on a dull day. Dont be afraid to take and use a tripod especially for landscape photographs,and use an aperture of F5.6 or F8,hence the need for a tripod,or you will get blurred photographs. A. Butler. tripod
customer_reviews.author: Mr A. BUTLER

product_meta.title: Fujifilm X-Pro1 16 MP Digital Camera with APS-C X-Trans CMOS Sensor (Body Only)
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Camera Only

Aimed at competent photographers looking for an edge on their existing camera, the X-Pro1 has ushered in a compact system, with a whole host of exciting features, accessories and more importantly.

Introducing the fujifilm X-Pro1 is an interchangeable lens system camera that features a 16 megapixel APS-C X-trans CMOS sensor, a brand X lens mount, a hybrid multi viewfinder and three prime lenses. Conventional array, Colour filter array.

The colour filter array is inspired by the natural random arrangement of the fine grains of silver halide in film.



BOX CONTAINS
X-Pro1 Camera Body Only
Lithium-Ion Battery NP-W126
Battery Charger BC-W126
Shoulder Strap
Body Cap and Protective Cover,
Clip Attaching Tool
USB Cable
CR-ROM
Owner's Manual
feature_bullets: Fujifilm X mount for fujinon XF lenses
High resolution 3 inch LCD Screen (1230 k dots)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars104 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
